titleStmt.title: A Defence of dramatick poetry being a review of Mr. Collier's View of the immorality and profaneness of the stage.
titleStmt.author: Filmer, Edward, b. ca. 1657.
Settle, Elkanah, 1648-1724.
Rymer, Thomas, 1641-1713.
Vanbrugh, John, Sir, 1664-1726.

notesStmt.note: Half title: A review of Mr. Collier.
Variously ascribed to Edward Filmer, Elkanah Settle, Thomas Rymer, and Sir John Vanbrugh.
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
